Label:
Updating court orders recreates the Certificate or Entitlement, cost order, decree nisi and decree absolute, based on the latest case data. Any other court orders e.g. decree nisi refusals, will remain unchanged.

If there have been updates to the case data e.g. change of Petitioner name, then these will be reflected in the updated court orders.

Previous versions of court orders will not be stored against the case.
